channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 53 – Koh Phangan
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
:) Thank you!
I guess the site is blocked because of the previous hijacks. Hopefully all the engines that flagged it for blocking it will eventually unblock it.
And everything here is public, including the videos and images. Any embarrasement caused by them I will have to cope with, I guess :)
item.content:encoded:
:)
Thank you!

I guess the site is blocked because of the previous hijacks. Hopefully all the engines that flagged it for blocking it will eventually unblock it.

And everything here is public, including the videos and images. Any embarrasement caused by them I will have to cope with, I guess :)

item.title: By: Taipan
item.dc:creator: Taipan
item.description: An btw, can I post links to your videos/images/blog in my commune?
item.content:encoded: An btw, can I post links to your videos/images/blog in my commune?

item.title: By: Taipan
item.dc:creator: Taipan
item.description:
Glad to re(a)d (as in envy-full-red) you're having a good time.
Maybe you'll be happy to see what my work place thinks of your blog right here: http://picasaweb.google.com/Gicoly/Misc#5315231267475193458
item.content:encoded:
Glad to re(a)d (as in envy-full-red) you’re having a good time.

Maybe you’ll be happy to see what my work place thinks of your blog right here:
http://picasaweb.google.com/Gicoly/Misc#5315231267475193458
